name: General dentistry
description: Diagnosis and treatment of oral diseases and their complications, elimination.

name: Esthetic dentistry
description: Aesthetic dentistry procedures can help you to get a perfect smile: whitening, building chips and teeth.

name: Orthodontics
description: The main object of treatment is a wrong bite. It can be corrected with the help of bracket systems.

name: Implant dentistry
description: The procedure for implant implantation in bone tissue, which is later put abutment and crown.

name: Surgery
description: Removal of the tooth, as well as emergency care for serious inflammatory diseases of the oral.
